artist: John D. Hall; The J & E Stevens Company
description: named for the Tammany Hall scandals of the 1870's, where New York politicians, including the mayor William Marcy 'Boss' Tweed (1823-1878) were accused of tremendous political and judicial corruption; the advertisement for this bank implied this corruption 'Put a coin in his hand and see how promptly he pockets it, and how politely he bows his thanks'
title: Tammany Mechanical Bank
